name: Retro Console Cat
description: Retro Console Cat is a delightful oscilloscope-themed robot with a unique twist. Sporting a box-shaped body reminiscent of classic gaming consoles, this adorable robot has a screen displaying an adorable cat. With its classic buttons and arms and legs positioned in a relaxed 'hand down' pose, Retro Console Cat brings a nostalgic charm to the world of robotics.
